ðŸ“– Summary: Buster is an OSINT tool designed for email reconnaissance. It gathers information about an email address, including associated social media accounts, data breaches, and links where the email was found. It can also generate possible email addresses and usernames, find emails from social media accounts or usernames, and discover work emails.
